data.comment: The match has started.
Chris Kavanagh awards Everton a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
Patrick Bamford for the away team is judged to be offside.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 4, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luke Ayling.
Everton to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Luke Ayling for Leeds is back on the field again.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Abdoulaye Doucoure for Everton drives towards goal at Goodison Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Leeds at Goodison Park.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in Liverpool.
Patrick Bamford (Leeds) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Everton push forward at Goodison Park and James Rodriguez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leeds defence.
In the minute 8, Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
Leeds drive forward but Raphinha is judged offside.
Jack Harrison for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Everton.
Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Everton drives forward and Richarlison gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Leeds's Kalvin Phillips gets in a shot on goal at Goodison Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Everton's area.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Everton.
In Liverpool Leeds drive forward through Patrick Bamford. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Everton at Goodison Park.
Everton's James Rodriguez has run offside.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Leeds throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Everton in the half of Leeds.
Luke Ayling is booked for the away team.
Everton's Michael Keane attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Raphinha (Leeds) strikes at Goodison Park but his header is cleared.
Important block from the Everton defence as Jack Harrison fires in a strike for Leeds.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 30, Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Leeds.
James Rodriguez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick Leeds.
James Rodriguez has recovered and rejoins the match in Liverpool.
In the minute 34, Leeds are caught offside.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Mason Holgate gets his shot on target but fails to score for Everton.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 42, Everton's Richarlison gets in a shot on goal at Goodison Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Everton.
Ben Godfrey for Everton is whistled offside.
In the minute 44, Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Everton pushes forward through Richarlison, whose finish on goal is saved.
Jack Harrison (Leeds) gets in a header â€“ but the strike hits the post! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 45, Leeds are pushing forward but Patrick Bamford's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Luke Ayling (Leeds) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Leeds's Mateusz Klich misses with an attempt on goal.
Chris Kavanagh awards Everton a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Goodison Park.
The second-half is now underway.
In Liverpool Everton drive forward through Dominic Calvert-Lewin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 47, Everton have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Leeds drive upfield and Patrick Bamford gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Everton defender.
Everton are coming forward and Dominic Calvert-Lewin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Leeds's Mateusz Klich breaks free at Goodison Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
In the minute 50, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Patrick Bamford of Leeds gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 51, Everton have a goal kick.
James Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Everton.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Free kick Leeds.
Richarlison for Everton drives towards goal at Goodison Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for Leeds at Goodison Park.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jack Harrison of Leeds smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 60, Allan (Everton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 61, Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Fabian Delph is replacing Tom Davies for Everton at Goodison Park.
In the minute 62, Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Liverpool Leeds drive forward through Ezgjan Alioski. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 64, Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Everton's half?
In Liverpool, Kalvin Phillips of Leeds is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Leeds are pushing forward but Raphinha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 64, Chris Kavanagh awards Everton a goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Ezgjan Alioski of Leeds is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 67, Carlo Ancelotti (Everton) is making a second substitution, with Andre Gomes replacing Alex Iwobi.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Leeds needs to be cautious. Everton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 69, Everton drives forward and James Rodriguez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Everton throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 72, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Everton.
In the minute 75, Everton's Allan misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
Everton have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Richarlison of Everton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in Liverpool.
In the minute 77, In Liverpool, Leeds push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Everton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leeds's half?
Raphinha puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 79, Great play from Jack Harrison to set up the goal.
Chris Kavanagh awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Everton at Goodison Park.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Everton.
Free kick for Leeds in the half of Everton.
In the minute 82, Bernard is on a sub for Mason Holgate for Everton.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marcelo Bielsa is making the team's first substitution at Goodison Park with Ian Poveda replacing Raphinha.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Throw-in Everton.
In the minute 88, Leeds's Ezgjan Alioski has run offside.
Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team have replaced Jack Harrison with Helder Costa. This is the second substitution made today by Marcelo Bielsa.
Free kick Everton.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Leeds in the half of Everton.
Leeds's Helder Costa gets in a shot on goal at Goodison Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Chris Kavanagh signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Everton's area.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Liam Cooper (Leeds) has received a yellow card from Chris Kavanagh.
Rodrigo Moreno is replacing Patrick Bamford for Leeds at Goodison Park.
Allan (Everton) gets a yellow card.
